Title: Hunter Killer
Writer: Arne Schmidt (screenplay by), Jamie Moss (screenplay by), George Wallace (based on the novel "Firing Point" written by), Don Keith (based on the novel "Firing Point" written by)
Actors: Ethan Baird, Jacob Scipio, Dempsey Bovell, Corey Johnson
Plot: An untested American submarine captain teams with U.S. Navy Seals to rescue the Russian president, who has been kidnapped by a rogue general.
